description:
Lumachina asks Diablo to accompany her to the royal capital, so he decides to stop by Faltra City on the way.
Diablo`s group is worried about Klem and Edelgard after such a long time apart, and Sylvie informs them that they`re at a bakery. Apparently the Fallen, Edelgard, had started a part-time job. Curious, Diablo and the others go to investigate...
Source: crunchyroll
